camera_gear.iso: 400 (To balance the relatively bright overcast sky with the street level darkness)

lighting_setup.weather: Heavy cloud cover, The sky presents a gradient color tone from dark gray to light yellow,Approaching the horizon is a warm pale yellow sunset glow
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Ambient Top Light (Soft) + Kinetic Street Lighting
lighting_setup.quality: Flat, shadowless natural light mixed with directional artificial streaks
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Grid of soft (6500K) interior office lights, bright red taillight trails

color_grading.palette: Muted Urban Tones; Off-White (Facade), Desaturated Sky vs. Pop of Red (Car lights) , Soft yellow (Windows) and grey blue shadow
color_grading.saturation: Low global saturation, High luminance on light sources
color_grading.contrast: Medium (The image is not high-contrast like the Blue Hour shots; it relies on the color contrast between the red trails and grey street)

texture_quality.details: Razor-sharp vertical mullions, clear visibility of interior furniture through glass
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Glass windows showing depth, asphalt road with motion blur sheen

atmosphere.feeling: The hustle of urban infrastructure; a 'Documentary' architectural style

technical_quality.post_processing: Motion Blur capture (Ghosting cars), Perspective Correction (Verticals kept straight), Highlight recovery in sky
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight/Cloudy (approx 5800K) - Keeping the grey sky neutral, rendering the interior lights soft
technical_quality.tone: Mid-tone dominant (Grey values), avoiding crushed blacks
technical_quality.dynamic_range: Standard-High (Preserving sky detail while capturing dark street corners)
